holidays.name: Give Something Away Day
holidays.description: A whimsical day encouraging people to give something ‚Äî anything! ‚Äî away to brighten someone else's day and spread kindness without expecting anything in return.
holidays.origin: Popularized by various online communities promoting acts of kindness and generosity, this day urges spontaneous giving to foster goodwill.
holidays.funFact: Some people have reported giving away very unusual items on this day, like a single sock or a spoon, just to keep the spirit quirky and fun!

holidays.name: Gummi Worm Day
holidays.description: Dedicated to celebrating the long, squiggly gummy worms beloved by candy enthusiasts everywhere. A sweet excuse to snack on these colorful chewy treats!
holidays.origin: Created by candy lovers and marketers to highlight the iconic gummy worm candy originally introduced in the 1980s.
holidays.funFact: Gummi worms were originally made in Germany using beeswax and starch before American companies popularized the gelatin-based versions.

holidays.name: Strawberry Rhubarb Pie Day
holidays.description: Honoring the deliciously tangy and sweet strawberry rhubarb pie, a summer classic dessert that marked cooler countryside picnics and family gatherings for generations.
holidays.origin: Inspired by the seasonal availability of strawberries and rhubarb and pie-baking traditions, this day invites baker enthusiasts to celebrate this unique flavor combo.
holidays.funFact: Strawberry rhubarb pie reportedly dates back to the 1800s in the US, where rhubarb was prized for its tartness and medicinal properties.

holidays.name: World Youth Skills Day
holidays.description: A global awareness day proclaimed by the United Nations to spotlight the importance of equipping young people with skills for employment, decent work, and entrepreneurship.
holidays.origin: Established in 2014 by the UN to raise awareness about the challenges facing youth in the labor market and the need for skill development programs.
holidays.funFact: Each year, World Youth Skills Day hosts events worldwide, from skill competitions to career fairs, celebrating the talents of young people everywhere.
